summary: The module defines a gate class that decomposes a multi‑controlled single‑qubit unitary into a circuit that implements the operation up to a diagonal factor, separating the diagonal component on the control and target qubits while preserving any ancilla qubits used in the construction.
business_intent: Enable efficient synthesis of multi‑controlled unitary operations in quantum algorithms by providing a reusable Qiskit component that reduces gate depth and ancilla usage through diagonal‑only decomposition, facilitating scalable circuit design and execution on quantum hardware.
